G

generateLicense(LicenseAlgorithm, String) - Method in class Server.ServerAuthentication
the generateLicense function is a server side function which returns a unique license key which is generated by using the algorithm and The passPhrase.
getHDDSerialNumber() - Static method in class utils.Keys
This function returns The Hard Disk serial key of the client machine
getLicenseOnline(String, String) - Method in class Client.ClientAuthentication
The getLicenseOnline method uses HTTP POST to send the token generated by the getToken() to the online server or payment gateway whose Url is provided.
getMachineKeys() - Method in class Client.ClientAuthentication
The getMachineKeys function returns a combination of three machine Dependent keys.
getMacId() - Static method in class utils.Keys
This function returns The MAC ID of the client machine
getMotherBoardSerialNumber() - Static method in class utils.Keys
This function returns The MotherBoard serial key of the client machine
getResponseCode() - Method in class Client.ClientAuthentication
The getResponseCode method is used to get the response code sent by the server if getLicenseOnline method is used
getToken(TokenAlgorithm) - Method in class Client.ClientAuthentication
The getToken method returns a unique token generated based on the client System and the PassPhrase.
